newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch SNS to buy Banque Suez Nederland.
newsitem.headline: Dutch SNS to buy Banque Suez Nederland.

text.p: Dutch unlisted savings bank SNS is planning to buy Banque Suez Nederland NV from Banque Indosuez, a unit of France's Cie de Suez, Dutch trade union FNV said on Wednesday.
Last month Dutch SNS Groep NV said it was in merger talks with unlisted Dutch insurer Reaal Groep NV.
In 1995 SNS net income from banking accounted for 73 percent of group income. Total insurance income in 1995 was 542 million guilders ($311.7 million).
At the end of 1995 SNS Groep NV had total assets of 27.51 billion guilders and equity capital of 1.45 billion.
It employs 2,787 full-time, or equivalent staff.
